dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Infringement]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 08, 2005 1:57 AM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------
From: - Fri Apr 08 01:54:31 2005
X-Mozilla-Status: 0001
X-Mozilla-Status2: 00000000

mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim 4.50)        id
1DJhSP-0000IN-6f        for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Thu, 07 Apr 2005
19:34:45 -0500

abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)        with smtp (Exim)        id

for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Thu, 07 Apr 2005 19:34:44 -0500

mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50)        id
1DJhSJ-0000Hn-MR        for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 07 Apr 2005 19:34:39
-0500

helo=priv-edtnes40.telusplanet.net)        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com
(envelope-from        donna@donnasholidaysentiments.com) with esmtp (Exim)        id
1DJhSF-0006qd-F7        for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 07 Apr 2005 19:34:39
-0500
Received: from donnasholidaysentiments.com ([154.20.90.223])        by
priv-edtnes40.telusplanet.net        (InterMail vM.6.01.04.00
201-2131-118-20041027) with ESMTP id
<20050408003434.NNVM24498.priv-edtnes40.telusplanet.net@donnasholidaysentime
nts.com>
for <abuse@theplanet.com>; Thu, 7 Apr 2005 18:34:34 -0600
Message-ID: <4255D1BB.A3843FC0@donnasholidaysentiments.com>
Date: Thu, 07 Apr 2005 17:35:07 -0700
From: Donna 's Holiday Sentiments <donna@donnasholidaysentiments.com>
X-Mailer: Mozilla 4.8 [en] (Win98; U)
X-Accept-Language: en
MIME-Version: 1.0
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 199.185.220.224 is
neither        permitted nor denied by domain of
donnasholidaysentiments.com)        client-ip=199.185.220.224;
envelope-from=donna@donnasholidaysentiments.com;
helo=priv-edtnes40.telusplanet.net;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.8
Cc:
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of Infringement
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.8

I am writing in regard to the unauthorized use of my copyrighted work on
someone else's web site.  I have emailed the site's owner numerous times,
but they do not respond.  The copyrighted work appears on the following
page:
http://www.borthakur.com/us/i_mother.html


I am with good faith belief that use the of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the
law.
As the owner of the copyright, I declare, under penalty of perjury, that the
above information in my Notice is accurate.

Thank you,

/Donna Sheehan/
Donna Sheehan
http://www.donnasholidaysentiments.com/mompoems.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
